1370: Amelgeir was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Lennot at age 23 in 1370.
Gave birth to Jois in 1370 at age 23.
1372: Gave birth to Claward in 1372 at age 25.
1374: Lost son Claward when Claward was 3 years old.
1376: Gave birth to Hildeburgis in 1376 at age 29.
1377: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1377 at age 30.
1379: Gave birth to Jiusippus in 1379 at age 32.
1381: Gave birth to Yoel in 1381 at age 34.
1382: Gave birth to Clarebout in 1382 at age 35.
1384: Gave birth to Ringot in 1384 at age 37.
Lost son Yoel when Yoel was 4 years old.
1385: Gave birth to Sygerus in 1385 at age 38.
1386: Gave birth to Ermerut in 1386 at age 39.
1390: Lost son Sygerus when Sygerus was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1394: Lost son Ringot when Ringot was 11 years old.
